title: Bright Space Rock To Light Up Sky, Comet To Visit After 80,000 Years
content: Comet C/2023 A3 (Tsuchinshan-ATLAS) is set to make a dramatic appearance in our skies over the next few weeks.
summary: Comet C/2023 A3 (Tsuchinshan-ATLAS) is set to make a dramatic appearance in our skies over the next few weeks.

title: Sahara Desert Turns Green, NASA Shares Stunning Image of Transformation
content: Historically, the Sahara was once covered in vegetation and lakes between 11,000 and 5,000 years ago
summary: Historically, the Sahara was once covered in vegetation and lakes between 11,000 and 5,000 years ago

title: Sri Lanka's President Appoints 3-Member Cabinet
content: Sri Lankan President Anura Kumara Dissanayake appointed a new Cabinet of Ministers on Tuesday evening, with Prime Minister Harini Amarasuriya, lawmaker Vijitha Herath and himself taking on Cabinet portfolios.
summary: Sri Lankan President Anura Kumara Dissanayake appointed a new Cabinet of Ministers on Tuesday evening, with Prime Minister Harini Amarasuriya, lawmaker Vijitha Herath and himself taking on Cabinet portfolios.

title: Biden Will Be Most Proud Of Deepening Partnership With India: White House
content: The India-US relationship is "strong and getting stronger", the White House said, adding that President Joe Biden when looks back at his term will be most proud of deepening the partnership with India, making it more inclusive and broadening.
summary: The India-US relationship is "strong and getting stronger", the White House said, adding that President Joe Biden when looks back at his term will be most proud of deepening the partnership with India, making it more inclusive and broadening.

title: Thousands Of Bones And Weapons Uncover Brutal 3,250-Year-Old Battle
content: Researchers have unearthed a trove of artefacts, including bronze and flint arrowheads, swords, wooden clubs, and human remains.
summary: Researchers have unearthed a trove of artefacts, including bronze and flint arrowheads, swords, wooden clubs, and human remains.

title: "Already Invited India": Zelenskyy On 2nd Peace Summit To End Ukraine Conflict
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy told the UN Security Council that "we have to prepare" the second peace summit to end the Russia-Ukraine war "altogether" and he has invited India and other countries to join the peace process.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy told the UN Security Council that "we have to prepare" the second peace summit to end the Russia-Ukraine war "altogether" and he has invited India and other countries to join the peace process.

title: China Conducts 1st Public Test Launch Of Intercontinental Ballistic Missile
content: Chinese defence ministry said it was a "routine arrangement in our annual training plan" and not directed at any country or target.
summary: Chinese defence ministry said it was a "routine arrangement in our annual training plan" and not directed at any country or target.

title: Pesto: The 22.5 Kg Baby Penguin That Has Gone Viral
content: Pesto, a nine-month-old penguin chick, is the largest penguin the Sea Life Melbourne has ever seen.
summary: Pesto, a nine-month-old penguin chick, is the largest penguin the Sea Life Melbourne has ever seen.

title: Black Man, Who Maintained He Didn't Kill Reporter, Executed In US
content: Marcellus Williams, 55, was sentenced to death in the midwestern state of Missouri for the 1998 killing of Felicia Gayle, a former newspaper reporter.
summary: Marcellus Williams, 55, was sentenced to death in the midwestern state of Missouri for the 1998 killing of Felicia Gayle, a former newspaper reporter.

title: US Woman, 28, Killed Outside Workplace For Rejecting Colleague's Advances
content: Carpenter, 38, shot Hammond in the neck in the parking lot of Dubow Textile, where they both worked.
summary: Carpenter, 38, shot Hammond in the neck in the parking lot of Dubow Textile, where they both worked.

title: Saudi Arabia Warns Pakistan To Prevent Beggars From Entering Country
content: Saudi Arabia has allegedly issued a warning to Pakistan to take action against the growing number of Pakistani beggars arriving in the country under the guise of religious pilgrimage.
summary: Saudi Arabia has allegedly issued a warning to Pakistan to take action against the growing number of Pakistani beggars arriving in the country under the guise of religious pilgrimage.

title: Hezbollah Missile Chief Killed In Israeli Airstrike On Beirut: 10 Points
content: An Israeli airstrike on Beirut on Tuesday killed Ibrahim Qubaisi, the head of Hezbollah's missile division. The cross-border firing between Israel and Hezbollah continued as the Iran-backed militant group fired over 300 rockets towards Israel.
summary: An Israeli airstrike on Beirut on Tuesday killed Ibrahim Qubaisi, the head of Hezbollah's missile division. The cross-border firing between Israel and Hezbollah continued as the Iran-backed militant group fired over 300 rockets towards Israel.

title: AI Uncovers 300 New Nazca Lines, Including 'Knife-Wielding Orca'
content: It took nearly a century to discover a total of 430 figurative Nazca geoglyphs, which offer significant insights into the ancient cultures at the Nazca Pampa.
summary: It took nearly a century to discover a total of 430 figurative Nazca geoglyphs, which offer significant insights into the ancient cultures at the Nazca Pampa.

title: US Intel Warns Of "Real, Specific" Iran Threats To Assassinate Donald Trump
content: Trump's campaign said that intelligence officials have identified that Iranian threats have "heightened in the past few months".
summary: Trump's campaign said that intelligence officials have identified that Iranian threats have "heightened in the past few months".

title: Hezbollah Announces Death Of Commander In Israeli Strike In Lebanon
content: Hezbollah announced on Wednesday the death of a commander, hours after the Israeli army said it had killed him in a strike on Beirut's southern suburbs which Lebanese authorities said killed six people.
summary: Hezbollah announced on Wednesday the death of a commander, hours after the Israeli army said it had killed him in a strike on Beirut's southern suburbs which Lebanese authorities said killed six people.

title: Kamala Harris Leads Trump By 38 Points Among Asian American Voters: Survey
content: Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris is leading by 38 points among Asian American voters against her Republican challenger Donald Trump, according to the results of a poll.
summary: Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris is leading by 38 points among Asian American voters against her Republican challenger Donald Trump, according to the results of a poll.

title: At UN, World Leaders Warn Against "Full-Scale War" Over Lebanon
content: World leaders lined up at the United Nations on Tuesday to call on Israel to refrain from a full-scale war in Lebanon, with the organization's chief warning the situation was on the "brink."
summary: World leaders lined up at the United Nations on Tuesday to call on Israel to refrain from a full-scale war in Lebanon, with the organization's chief warning the situation was on the "brink."

title: Crypto CEO And Bankman-Fried Ex Caroline Ellison Gets Two-Year Sentence
content: Caroline Ellison, who testified against her former boyfriend and FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried at his crypto fraud trial, was sentenced Tuesday to two years in prison for her role in the case, New York prosecutors told AFP.
summary: Caroline Ellison, who testified against her former boyfriend and FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried at his crypto fraud trial, was sentenced Tuesday to two years in prison for her role in the case, New York prosecutors told AFP.

title: Russia "Can Only Be Forced Into Peace," Zelensky Tells UN
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said Tuesday at the United Nations that Russia can only be forced into a peace settlement, as he vowed not to negotiate on Moscow's terms to end the war.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said Tuesday at the United Nations that Russia can only be forced into a peace settlement, as he vowed not to negotiate on Moscow's terms to end the war.

title: Gunman Ryan Routh Charged With Attempted Assassination Of Trump
content: The gunman accused of planning to kill Donald Trump at his Florida golf course was indicted Tuesday on three additional counts, including attempted assassination of a major presidential candidate, the US Department of Justice announced.
summary: The gunman accused of planning to kill Donald Trump at his Florida golf course was indicted Tuesday on three additional counts, including attempted assassination of a major presidential candidate, the US Department of Justice announced.
